- Part C1: PSO for benchmark optimization (Rastrigin, Rosenbrock)
- Part C2: PSO applied to Sudoku optimization

- All algorithms implemented from scratch without specialized libraries
- Extensive comments with references to Russell & Norvig and lecture slides
- Comprehensive test suite with 100% pass rate
- PowerShell script for batch execution
- README with AI disclosure and run instructions
- LaTeX template for AAAI format report
- 5-minute timeout safeguards on all algorithms
